title: I guess I'm still level 1 after all these years!
body:
So how come I can't make discussions? I'm level 30! 

This is unacceptable.

I'll sue, rito.

Don't push me, I have soap.

replies.body:
I took a look at your account to check out why you might still be showing as a Level 1 account. It seems like this account is indeed only level one. The level 30 account you're talking about may be a different account, so make sure you're logging into the correct username and region. 

If you run into any trouble, reach out to our Account Recovery team through our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) to take a closer look.
Hm... Does the "level" on this site correspond to the level ingame?
Yep! Your in-game summoner level = your boards level ^_^

Ah, okay! I see now what the issue was!

My region was set to Eu Nordic and East and not West.

My mistake.
The same thing happened to me too.. The level part that is {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Also it seems that my name is "Ummas". 

What is "Ummas"?

My profile name is Sgt Flaccid, not "Ummas"

I'm about to blow a casket.
